name: Laxmi motorcycle repairing centre
comment: I spoke directly with the owner, and he mentioned that customers usually bring their own lubricants and spare parts since there’s a shop right next door. However, he ensures that only original spare parts are used.He also shared that they purchase Castrol (1 litre) at ₹400 and Valvoline (1 litre) at ₹380.He’s personally invited me to meet him on 15th November to discuss further opportunities.
